mapper.select: SELECT /* cslAss.getCslAssInfo */ MBR_NO , FST_DRUG_CD , FST_DRUG , MAIN_DRUG_CD , MAIN_DRUG , FST_AGE , USE_TERM , USE_FRQ_CD , USE_CAU_CD , USE_CAU_ETC , LAW_PBM_CD , LAW_PBM_ETC , PHYS_PBM , SPRT_PBM_CD , SPRT_PBM_ETC , MSR_INF , LST_AGE , PRSN_CD , EMTN_CD , ACTN_CD , FMLY_CD , IT_RL_CD , MI_ETC , SVR_RCG_DGR , EXP_EFC , MI_MEMO , CRE_ID , CRE_DT , UPD_ID , UPD_DT FROM CSL_ASS WHERE MBR_NO = #{mbrNo}
